detaileddescription.para:
dev
Pointer to the device structure for the driver instance
n_entries
How many IRTE to allocate
Note: It will try to allocate all, or it will fail.

simplesect.para: The first allocated IRTE index, or -EBUSY on failure

memberdef.definition: static uint32_t vtd_remap_msi
memberdef.name: vtd_remap_msi

briefdescription.para: Generate the MSI Message Address data for the given vector.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device structure for the driver instance
A valid allocated MSI vector array
the size of the vector array

memberdef.definition: static int vtd_remap
memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev, uint8_t irte_idx, uint16_t vector, uint32_t flags, uint16_t src_id)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device structure for the driver instance
A previoulsy allocated irte entry index number
An allocated interrupt vector
interrupt flags
a valid source ID or USHRT_MAX if none

simplesect.para: 0 on success, a negative errno otherwise
